errors.error_description: Listed unnecessary manual dependencies that are automatically handled by pip
correction_candidates: Install Font Bakery directly: `pip install fontbakery`
Simply run: `pip install fontbakery` to get all required dependencies
Use the standard installation command: `pip install fontbakery`
Install with: `pip install fontbakery[all]` for complete installation
errors.golden_answer: Install Font Bakery directly: `pip install fontbakery`
